content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) with a drop position at (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -48.5), (-13.5, -49.5), and (-18.5, -48.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)

### Coal Supply Chain
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) with a drop position at (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), and (47.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5) and (41.5, -78.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Failed to supply iron ore to furnaces due to lack of inventory
- Ensure that your inventory contains the necessary items before attempting to supply entities.

### Chest at drop position is full
- Regularly check and empty chests at drop positions to prevent mining operations from stalling.

### Burner Inserter out of fuel
- Regularly refuel burner inserters to maintain continuous operation.
